Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are energy converters that directly transform the chemical energy of combustible gases into electrochemical energy by oxidation.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions upon electrical properties of 8 mol.% yttria-stabilised zirconia

Sentencas: The design of SOFC, which has the highest volumetric power density, is a planar one in which the electrolyte, yttria-stabilised zirconia (YSZ), can be optimised by strengthening with small additions of alpha-Al3O3.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions upon electrical properties of 8 mol.% yttria-stabilised zirconia

Sentencas: Different commercial powders have different impurity contents and thus show different changes in ionic conductivity when alpha-Al2O3 is added.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions upon electrical properties of 8 mol.% yttria-stabilised zirconia

Sentencas: We describe the changes in oxide ion conductivity of Tosoh 8 mol.% YSZ that has been added to with a-alumina.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions upon electrical properties of 8 mol.% yttria-stabilised zirconia

Sentencas: AC impedance measurements show that small additions (similar to 1 wt.%) of Al2O3 can cause the ionic conductivity of Tosoh 8YSZ to increase due to a decrease in the grain boundary impedance which is observable at low to medium temperatures.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions upon electrical properties of 8 mol.% yttria-stabilised zirconia

Sentencas: Small wt.% additions of alpha-Al2O3 also cause an overall decrease in the high temperature impedance of 8YSZ.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions upon electrical properties of 8 mol.% yttria-stabilised zirconia

Sentencas: We have found that 10 wt.% alumina can be added to 8YSZ without any significant decrease in ionic conducting properties.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions upon electrical properties of 8 mol.% yttria-stabilised zirconia

Sentencas: Further additions of alumina cause a rapid decrease in conductivity due to the large volume percent of insulating alumina phases, which are present, and also due to the cracking of pellets that occurs on firing.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions upon electrical properties of 8 mol.% yttria-stabilised zirconia

Sentencas: We also report the improved stability of added-alumina 8YSZ to hydrothermal ageing.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions upon electrical properties of 8 mol.% yttria-stabilised zirconia

Sentencas: Hydrothermal ageing of unadded to 8YSZ, in an autoclave at 180 degrees C, can lead to a decrease in the conductivity at 1000 degrees C by as much as 40%.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions upon electrical properties of 8 mol.% yttria-stabilised zirconia

Sentencas: The drop in conductivity of 8YSZ can be limited to a decrease of only 10% by the addition of greater than 5 wt.% Al2O3.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions upon electrical properties of 8 mol.% yttria-stabilised zirconia
